entry.title: How to Upgrade Your Gentoo Linux Kernel - Best Guide on YouTube!

media:group.media:title: How to Upgrade Your Gentoo Linux Kernel - Best Guide on YouTube!
media:group.media:description:
In this video I show you how to upgrade your kernel on Gentoo Linux, I go over the full steps from how to make newer kernels available, how to download them, compile them, and make them bootable. The commands used in this video are written below
0. write "sys-kernel/gentoo-sources ~amd64" to your package.accept_keywords file 1. emerge --sync 2. emerge -uDNq --with-bdeps=y 3. cp /usr/src/linux/.config $(uname -r).config
4. eselect kernel list 5. eselect kernel set "NEW KERNEL NUMBER" become root, or add sudo to the beginning of the following commands make mrproper 6. copy the configuration file you backed up in step 3 7. mount "boot partition" /boot (don't forget -U if using UUID) 8. make modules_prepare 9. make -j4 && make modules_install && make install
10. emerge @module-rebuild
11. grub-mkconfig -o /boot/grub/grub.cfg 12. Reboot into your new kernel, congratulations, you're done :D
Subscribe to my YouTube channel http://goo.gl/9U10Wz and be sure to click that notification bell so you know when new videos are released. ‚Çøüí∞üíµüí≤Help Support the Channel by Donating Cryptoüí≤üíµüí∞‚Çø

entry.title: Gentoo LTO Overlay Installation Guide (LTO, -O3, & Graphite)

media:group.media:title: Gentoo LTO Overlay Installation Guide (LTO, -O3, & Graphite)
media:group.media:description:
In this video I show you how to install the Gentoo LTO overlay https://github.com/InBetweenNames/gentooLTO
***Commands used in this video***
sudo layman -a mv sudo layman -a lto-overlay
add the following strings to your package.accept_keyworks sys-config/ltoize ~amd64 app-portage/portage-bashrc-mv ~amd64 app-shells/runtitle ~amd64
Its also a good idea to upgrade GCC before building LTO
sudo emerge sys-config/ltoize
emerge -e @world
***Links to learn more*** Graphite https://polly.llvm.org/
O3 https://wiki.gentoo.org/wiki/GCC_optimization
LTO https://llvm.org/docs/LinkTimeOptimization.html
Subscribe to my YouTube channel http://goo.gl/9U10Wz and be sure to click that notification bell so you know when new videos are released.

media:group.media:title: Installing the Latest Version of Packages on Gentoo
media:group.media:description:
